meanings.definition: The practice of educating children at home instead of sending them to a traditional school.
meanings.sent1: Homeschooling can be a great option for families who prefer personalized education.
meanings.sent2: Many parents choose homeschooling to tailor their child's learning experience.
meanings.sent3: When the power went out, the only light in the house was from the homeschooling books.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden, with homeschooling as the seeds of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: In the world of education, homeschooling shines as a beacon of individualized learning.

meanings.definition: The act of teaching one's own children at home.
meanings.sent1: Homeschooling requires dedication and patience from parents.
meanings.sent2: Some families find joy in the flexibility that homeschooling offers.
meanings.sent3: The cat joined the homeschooling session, eager to learn alongside the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was the classroom, with homeschooling as the curriculum of love.
meanings.sent5: The bond between parent and child grows strong through the journey of homeschooling.
